metadata.title: CVE-2023-6932 linux
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's ipv4: igmp component can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation.  A race condition can be exploited to cause a timer be mistakenly registered on a RCU read locked object which is freed by another thread.  We recommend upgrading past commit e2b706c691905fe78468c361aaabc719d0a496f1.
